p: All 801 samples were first screened to detect the presence of neutralizing antibodies to ZIKV. Of the 83 ZIKV IgM-positive samples, 8 demonstrated neutralizing antibodies to ZIKV (PRNT 50 = 1: 40 to 1: 640). Of the 8 samples, 3 (Z141a, Z153a, Z735a) exhibited ZIKV antibody titers that were > 4-fold higher than the antibody titers for all 4 DENV serotypes (PRNT 50 ZIKV = 1: 160 to 1: 640) (Table 2). The remaining 5 samples (Z120a, Z138a, Z140a, Z420a, Z476a) were classified as probable ZIKV infections (PRNT 50 ZIKV = 1: 40–1: 640).
